fields.text: Welcome to LaunchDarkly in the East Bay, empowering you to deploy code safely and release features when you’re ready.
For technical support with feature management, press [INDEX].
If you need assistance with feature flags configuration, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to a feature flags specialist from LaunchDarkly; your call is important to us.
For help with integration, setup, or API questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our integration support team; we appreciate your patience.
To speak with our sales team about plans and pricing, press [INDEX].
For information on pricing tiers and subscription options, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to our pricing specialists; thank you for choosing LaunchDarkly.
To schedule a live demo and explore features, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we arrange your demo; a representative will be with you shortly.
